715921f-a.folder: Allen Street & Grand Street, Manhattan, NY

715922f-a.text:
Allen Street, north from Grand Street, showing prominently demolition on the easterly side of this thoroughfare. View 1 is from the downtown platform of the "El" station and view 2 is at the street level. 'Tote to the left of the former, the cleared
area, north of Broome Street.
View 1: September 30, 1931
View 2: October 12, 1931
P. L. Sperr
715922f-a.folder: Allen Street & Grand Street, Manhattan, NY

715922f-b.text:

area, north of Broome Street.
View 1: September 30, 1931
View 2: October 12, 1931
P. L. Sperr
715922f-b.folder: Allen Street & Grand Street, Manhattan, NY

720096f-a.text:
Grand Street, south side, east from but not including Allen, to, but not including Orchard Street, as seen through clearance at the N.E. corner of
Allen Street, for the widening of Allen Street.
October 12, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
